block_timestamp_month.column_description: Month of the block which contains this transaction

virtual_size.column_description: The virtual transaction size (differs from size for witness transactions)

outputs.column_description: 0-indexed number of an input within a transaction

lock_time.column_description: Earliest time that miners can include the transaction in their hashing of the Merkle root to attach it in the latest block of the blockchain

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block which contains this transaction

is_coinbase.column_description: true if this transaction is a coinbase transaction

input_value.column_description: Total value of inputs in the transaction

output_count.column_description: The number of outputs in the transaction

size.column_description: The size of this transaction in bytes

output_value.column_description: Total value of outputs in the transaction

block_number.column_description: Number of the block which contains this transaction

version.column_description: Protocol version specified in block which contained this transaction

input_count.column_description: The number of inputs in the transaction

fee.column_description: The fee paid by this transaction

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block which contains this transaction
